presentacio: I am a third-year Computer Engineering student eager to take my first steps in the industry. With an open attitude, I focus on learning, achieving goals, and applying my skills to support teams and help companies grow.

projectes.descripcio: I independently modified a game to improve certain mechanics, driven by curiosity and a desire to experiment with game development.

I created and managed an online game server for my friends, learning technical aspects like server configuration and game modifications, as well as creative aspects like organizing events and managing player interactions and conflicts.

rendiment: Academically, I consider myself a good student. Although my average grade is 7.1, I have never had to retake an exam and have felt comfortable with all subjects.
experiencia: Although I don't have professional experience yet, I bring technical solidity and commitment to learn and contribute effectively within a team.

formacio.descripcio: Currently in the third year of studies
